content.rendered:
W1 Pro is the new generation ﬁngerprint time attendance terminal based on Linux platform. W1 Pro houses a 2.8-inch color LCD with rich colors and an intuitive GUI that is easy to understand and self-explanatory. Full capacitive touch keypads along with touch optical ﬁngerprint sensors will provide convenient operation experience and improve the practicality of the wet and dry ﬁngerprint.

Features

  • User – 3000
  • Card – 3000
  • Record – 100,000
  • Display – 2.8-inch TFT Screen
  • Communication – Mini USB Host, TCP/IP, Optional Bluetooth
  • Identification mode – Fingerprint, Password, Card.
  • Identification speed – <0.5s>
  • Card reading distance – 1~5cm ( 125KHz), 13.56MHz >2CM ) for standard CR80 card
  • RFID card – Optional EM and Mifare
  • Power – DC 5V
